item.title: UC Berkeley Podcast Studio- Engaging & Amplifying Student Voices
item.description: Through the Berkeley Changemakers Innovation Grant, Dr. Pablo Gonzalez and his team have created a fully functioning podcast studio for students, faculty, and staff to utilize. The purpose of this studio is to give the UC Berkeley community a platform to amplify their voices.

item.title: Lucid Learning - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: Lucid Learning is a tool to help students practice collaboration early in their careers.

item.title: RTL AR/VR - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: RTL will partner with the CTO and our AR/VR 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant awardees to develop a community of practice for AR/VR supporting instruction and research.

item.title: VRTutor - 2020 Berkeley Changemaker Technology Innovation Grant Awardee [ARCHIVE]
item.description: This project, submitted by professor Luisa Caldas and Architecture, Building Science and Technology researcher Elnaz Tafrihi Bailey will fund the development of a Virtual, Augmented and Mixed Reality (VR/AR/MR) tool developed by the College of Environmental Design.
